questions.q: Which quantity remains constant when an object moves with uniform circular motion?
An object is thrown vertically upward. At its highest point, which of the following is true?
options: Velocity is zero, acceleration is zero
Velocity is zero, acceleration is downward
Velocity is maximum, acceleration is zero
Velocity and acceleration are both upward
questions.correct: Velocity is zero, acceleration is downward
